original_title: UFC Fight Night 114: Pettis vs. Moreno
overview: UFC Fight Night 114: Pettis vs. Moreno was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on August 5, 2017, at Arena Ciudad de MÃ©xico in Mexico City, Mexico. A flyweight bout between Sergio Pettis and Brandon Moreno headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 114: Pettis vs. Moreno
